txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: Courage is doing what you're afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you're scared.
txt_cn: 行畏惧之事可谓勇；无畏则无勇。
author: Eddie Rickenbacker

txt_en: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
txt_cn: 世界上任何伟业的成就都离不开热情。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: Every sweet has its sour; every evil its good.
txt_cn: 甘饴有其酸涩，恶人亦有善行。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: Faith doesn't mean you never doubt. It only means you never act upon your doubts.
txt_cn: 拥有信念并不代表毫无疑虑，它只意味着你从不带着疑虑行事。
author: Orson Scott Card

txt_en: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
txt_cn: 生命中有了细小的变化，才算是真正地活着。
author: Leo Tolstoy

txt_en: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
txt_cn: 我们越接近目标，就会遇到越多困难。
author: Goethe
